title: Article 2 [2]  - Fees provided for in the Convention and in the Implementing Regulations

content.text: The fees due to be paid to the Office under Article 1 RFees, unless otherwise provided in paragraph 2, shall be as follows:

[19]  For European patent applications filed before 1 April 2009 and international applications which entered the regional phase before that date, the amount of the fees specified in Article 2, item 3 RFees, Article 2, item 3a RFees, Article 2, item 7 RFees and Article 2, item 15 of the Rules relating to Fees as in force until 31 March 2009 shall be as follows:

[24] The President of the Office shall determine the formats referred to in Article 2, paragraphs 1 and 2, and may specify the conditions under which a document referred to in Article 2, paragraphs 1 and 2, is deemed to have been filed online in character-coded format.

[25] Fee levels which relate to the use of a means of electronic communication or a format referred to in Article 2, paragraphs 1 and 2, shall not apply until a date set by the President of the Office.

footnotes.content: Last amended by decision of the Administrative Council CA/D 16/ CA/D 16/3 of 14.1.0 14.1.03 (OJ EPO 04, A3OJ EPO 03, A5), which entered into force on 01.04.03 01.04.04.

Amended by decision of the Administrative Council CA/D 12/19 of 12.12.2019 (OJ EPO 2020, A), which entered into force on 01.04.2020. See decision of the Administrative Council CA/D 11/18 of 12.12.2018 (OJ EPO 2019, A) in conjunction with notice from the EPO of 24.01.2019 concerning the application of these fee levels (OJ EPO 2019, A6).
Pursuant to Article 2, sentence 1, CA/D 11/18 (OJ EPO 2019, A3), this fee level does not currently apply. It will be applicable from a date to be set by the President of the Office.
See decision of the President of the EPO and notice from the EPO of 09.0.2019 concerning the electronic filing of documents (OJ EPO 2018, A4 and A46).
This fee level applies to all online filings until a date to be set by the President of the Office from which the fee level under (i) will become applicable.
This fee level applies to all non-online filings.
